SWS #811 delayed in departure
Southwest Service train #811 scheduled to depart Chicago Union station at 1:42 PM is delayed in departure due to an Amtrak train derailment. Updates will be provided as information becomes available.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Homewood East Elevator
The Homewood East Elevator is out of Service. Customers can use Calumet or Flossmoor as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED North End Platform Boarding
Metra Electric outbound trains will arrive and board from the north end of the platform at 18th street, McCormick Place - 23rd Street, 27th Street and 47th Street.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Homewood Platform Elevator
The Homewood Platform Elevator is out of Service. Customers can use Calumet or Flossmoor as alternate boarding stations.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Brainerd Platform Rehabilitation Will Begin Monday, April 24

Beginning Monday, April 24, the west half of Platform #2 will be closed for rehabilitation.  Customers must use the pedestrian crossing at Loomis Street to access the boarding platforms.  The work will move to the east half of platform #2 and into Platform #1 to complete the project by the end of July.  Please allow additional time to access the in-service portion of the platform.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-N - Track construction Saturday, April 29 through Sunday, April 30

Track construction will begin Saturday, April 29 through Sunday, April 30. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 15 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert UP-NW - Track construction Saturday, April 29 through Sunday, April 30

Track construction will begin Saturday, April 29 through Sunday, April 30. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 20 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
